content: Grateful for my therapist who helps me see things from a new perspective every week.
Thankful for my morning coffee ritual that gives me a peaceful start to each day.
Appreciating the sunset I watched from my balcony - sometimes the simplest moments bring the most joy.
Grateful for my friend who listened to me vent today without trying to fix everything - just being heard was enough.
Thankful for my cozy reading nook and the escape that books provide when life feels overwhelming.
